titleStmt.title: Here is a necessarye treatyse for all maner persons to reade, and hath to name, the Maydens crosse rewe
Maydens crosse rewe
titleStmt.author: Wyer, Robert, fl. 1530-1556.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end "q[uod] Robert Wyer", on which basis the authorship is sometimes attributed to him; but as he printed the book it may be meant as an imprint.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
